p.d: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web. Based on an original idea by Olivier Szulzynger, Toma de Matteis, Éline Le Fur, Cristina Arellano, Stéphanie Tchou-Cotta (season 3, France, 2020) Cast: Mélanie Maudran (Claire Estrela), Maëlle Mietton (Alice Bastide), Jérémy Banster (Julien Bastide), Fred Bianconi (Virgile Berville), Bertrand Farge (Victor Estrela), Chrystelle Labaude (Élizabeth Bastide), MoIse Santamaria (Manu Léoni) Genre: comedy drama
